WVC_XenotypesAndGenes.ThrallDef.Name: WVC_XenotypesAndGenes_ThrallDefs_Base
WVC_XenotypesAndGenes.ThrallDef.label: thrall
WVC_XenotypesAndGenes.ThrallDef.description: An ordinary thrall with its own strengths and weaknesses.

WVC_XenotypesAndGenes.ThrallDef.label: fielder
WVC_XenotypesAndGenes.ThrallDef.description: Field modification of the thrall. They have a bonus to speed and can easily recover from cutting wounds.

WVC_XenotypesAndGenes.ThrallDef.label: striker
WVC_XenotypesAndGenes.ThrallDef.description: Combat modification of the thrall. These thralls are excellent fighters.

WVC_XenotypesAndGenes.ThrallDef.label: artister
WVC_XenotypesAndGenes.ThrallDef.description: Crafter modification of the thrall. These thralls are excellent artists and crafters.

WVC_XenotypesAndGenes.ThrallDef.label: smartkin
WVC_XenotypesAndGenes.ThrallDef.description: Research modification of the thrall. These thralls are excellent doctors and researchers.

WVC_XenotypesAndGenes.ThrallDef.label: gardernkind
WVC_XenotypesAndGenes.ThrallDef.description: Green modification of the thrall. These thralls are excellent gardeners and tamers. They also have excellent innate armor and bonus to speed.

WVC_XenotypesAndGenes.ThrallDef.label: molekin
WVC_XenotypesAndGenes.ThrallDef.description: Mining modification of the thrall. These thralls are excellent cooks and miners.

WVC_XenotypesAndGenes.ThrallDef.label: carrier
WVC_XenotypesAndGenes.ThrallDef.description: Power modification of the thrall. These thralls have very good innate armor, and can also carry significantly more weight.

WVC_XenotypesAndGenes.ThrallDef.label: fortkind
WVC_XenotypesAndGenes.ThrallDef.description: Defensive modification of the thrall. These thralls are incredibly durable.
